pr_title: added option to configure operator pod resource requests and limit

timeline.message: added option to configure resource req and limit

timeline.bodyText: Should the defaults be increased?  This question is for both Anil & @rjeberhard
timeline.author: tbarnes-us

replies.bodyText: Yes, I agree that defaults should be increased at least for cpu request. With cpu request of "100m", JVM uses "defNew" and "SerialOld" GC (single threaded). Even when I configured JVM to use G1 GC, JVM ran with a parallel GC but with only one GC thread. However, I'm not aware of reason for previous default value of "100m". I wanted to get @rjeberhard Ryan's thoughts on the default values and I can increase them accordingly.
replies.author: ankedia
